attributes.action: Dismiss Mr George Freeman MP on grounds of discrimination
attributes.additional_details:
The equality act 2010 definition of discrimination 
http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2010/15/section/13

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/benefits-george-freeman-really-disabled-people-anxiety-pills-depression-mental-health-a7600931.html
attributes.background: Mr George Freeman MP for Norwich publically stated that people with mental illness aren't seriously disabled, I feel he is not fit for his role as has openly discriminated against mental health. This should be grounds for dismissal due to gross misconduct. It would be in any other job.

rejection.details: In any case, the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
